item.title: Easy Healthy Broccoli Pasta
item.description: This Easy Healthy Broccoli Pasta is a delightful dish that's quick to prepare and packed with nutrients. Perfect for busy weeknights, it brings the family together with its vibrant flavors and comforting textures.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 pound broccoli florets
  • 8 ounces pasta of your choice
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • Parmesan cheese for serving

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook the pasta according to package instructions.
  2. In the last 3 minutes of cooking, add the broccoli florets to the pot.
  3. Drain the pasta and broccoli, reserving a cup of pasta water.
  4. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat and sautÃ© the minced garlic until fragrant.
  5. Add the drained pasta and broccoli to the skillet, tossing to combine. If needed, add reserved pasta water to reach desired consistency.
  6. Season with salt and pepper, and serve with grated Parmesan cheese.

item.title: Easy Summer Tomato and Eggplant Pie
item.description: Enjoy a fresh summer tomato and eggplant pie, perfect for a light vegetarian meal or Mediterranean diet. This easy recipe uses simple ingredients and brings seasonal flavors to your table.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 2 medium eggplants, sliced
  • 4 ripe tomatoes, sliced
  • 1 cup mozzarella cheese, shredded
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • Fresh basil for garnish

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 375Â°F (190Â°C).
  2. Layer the sliced eggplants and tomatoes in a pie dish.
  3. Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
  4. Top with shredded mozzarella cheese.
  5. Bake for 30 minutes or until the cheese is bubbly and golden.
